description:
Get started with marketing your Holiday Let Property using Social Media, start with the basics and implement a strategy that lasts, is simple to implement and consistently keep working moving forwards. Before starting on a social media campaign, you need to know how to get set up on the various social media platforms that will be the best for you and your Holiday Let. We will take a look how social media is used in the business world and we will go through the basics of each social media platform included in the course. We will also walk through the process of setting up accounts and basic terminology.

Most Holiday Home Owners recognise the value that social media can have in their Holiday Let Businesses, however the worry of how to get going, what sort of strategy to use for each platform and how maintaining a presence online will fit into their already hectic schedules can put owners off getting going. Weâ€™ll address each of these issues and most importantly give you the tools and know how to keep your social media presence constant, which is a key element of your Social Media Marketing, in just a couple of hours a week. You can even keep control from the comfort of your own sofa!
title: Social Media 101 for Holiday Let | Vacation Rental Owners
